backend/main.mo: Defines actor data types for books, meditation sessions, journals, user profiles, rituals, and progress tracking along with initial book data.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping feature IDs to affected files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries for numerous frontend files describing their purpose and functionality.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_RUNBOOK.md: Runbook outlining prerequisites and step-by-step instructions for redeploying the frontend and backend.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT_TROUBLESHOOTING.md: Template for diagnosing deployment failures with checklists for each deployment phase.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and theme variables for light and dark modes with OKLCH color values.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting up error handlers, environment shims, and loading the React app root.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures TanStack Router routes, global theme provider, error boundary, and toast system for the app.
frontend/src/components/AmbientMusicCaro: Carousel for selecting ambient audio tracks with swipe, volume, and mute controls, managing playback via an Audio element.
frontend/src/components/AppErrorBoundary: React error boundary that displays a detailed error screen with stack traces and reload option.
frontend/src/components/CloudSyncErrorBa: Destructive alert banner for cloud sync errors with a retry button and loading state.
frontend/src/components/DashboardBackBut: Provides fixed-position back buttons for navigating to the dashboard on mobile and desktop.
frontend/src/components/ExportImportCont: Floating UI controls for exporting and importing JSON data with loading indicators.
frontend/src/components/FeatureCard.tsx: Empty component file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/FloatingNav.tsx: Vertical floating navigation bar with hover labels and animated icons linking to main app sections.
frontend/src/components/HamburgerMenu.ts: Mobile slide-out menu providing theme toggle, authentication actions, and navigation, integrated with Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/KnowledgeBookPag: Paged content viewer with keyboard, swipe navigation, and auto-scrolling between pages.
frontend/src/components/KnowledgeCategor: Carousel component for category selection with swipe, keyboard, and animated card positioning.
frontend/src/components/KnowledgeQuizDia: Quiz dialog that shuffles questions, tracks answers, navigates between them, and shows results.
frontend/src/components/lotus-r3f/LotusM: Three.js lotus model that animates petals, stem, and center glow based on growth state and theme.
frontend/src/components/lotus-r3f/LotusP: Three.js particle system around the lotus that animates in coherent or chaotic patterns depending on growth state.
frontend/src/components/LotusCanvas.tsx: Canvas-based animated lotus and particle effect with theme- and variant-based visual intensity.
frontend/src/components/MeditationCarous: Meditation selector carousel with swipe navigation and animated centered card display.
frontend/src/components/MeditationGuideS: Stepper component for meditation guide steps with swipe navigation, animations, and parsed content.
frontend/src/components/MeditationTimerR: Canvas-based circular timer with animated wave edge, glow effect, and theme-aware styling.
frontend/src/components/MeditationTimerW: Canvas wave-fill animation showing vertical progress with dynamic wave motion and centered time text.
frontend/src/components/MobileBackButton: Mobile-only back button that navigates to the dashboard when tapped.
frontend/src/components/PageBackgroundSh: Page wrapper that applies a themed background and renders an animated LotusCanvas behind children.
frontend/src/components/ProgressBowl.tsx: Canvas-rendered bowl that fills with animated liquid based on total meditation minutes and theme colors.
frontend/src/components/ProgressLotusR3F: 3D lotus visualization using React Three Fiber that grows and animates based on total meditation minutes.
frontend/src/components/ProgressLotusSVG: SVG-based animated lotus whose petals, glow, and breathing effects respond to growth state and streak.
frontend/src/components/QuizDialog.tsx: Multi-step quiz dialog that collects answers and computes a recommended meditation type.
frontend/src/components/RitualSelectionM: Displays a modal listing up to five saved rituals and allows starting or deleting one, with an empty state when none exist.
frontend/src/components/SavedRitualsCaro: Renders a swipeable carousel of saved rituals with start and delete actions, including confirmation handling and swipe navigation.
frontend/src/components/SessionIndicator: Shows login state and provides logout or return-to-start actions based on Internet Identity authentication.
Provides standard page navigation with optional back button, theme toggle, session indicator, and mobile hamburger menu.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and provider for managing Internet Identity auth, including loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useMeditationTimer.ts: Implements a countdown meditation timer with pause, seek, progress calculation, and completion callback.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching meditation types, quotes, and other app data with fallbacks and guest storage handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets global Tailwind layers, themes, OKLCH color tokens, and custom animations for styling.
frontend/src/lib/bookData.ts: Exports a list of recommended meditation-related books with metadata and Amazon links.
frontend/src/lib/knowledgeContent.ts: Contains structured educational content and quizzes for various meditation techniques.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
Empty or placeholder file for an active meditation page.
frontend/src/pages/BookRecommendationsPa: Page showing swipeable book recommendations with theme toggle, navigation, and animated card transitions.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Main dashboard displaying quotes, meditation options, rituals, and navigation with quiz and ritual modals.
frontend/src/pages/JournalPage.tsx: Journal management page supporting search, filtering, editing, favoriting, deleting, and importing/exporting entries.
frontend/src/pages/KnowledgePage.tsx: Knowledge base page with category carousel, technique content, quiz tracking, and deep-link scrolling.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page handling login, guest mode, theme toggle, and redirecting authenticated users to the dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/PreMeditationPage.tsx: Page handling meditation setup, active session, and reflection workflow with timers, rituals, guides, and mood/energy logging.
frontend/src/pages/ProgressPage.tsx: Displays user meditation stats, streaks, and progress visuals with import/export and cloud sync error handling.
frontend/src/pages/ReflectionPage.tsx: Empty page placeholder for future reflection content.
frontend/src/pages/StatsPage.tsx: Empty page placeholder for future stats display.
frontend/src/utils/cloudSync.ts: Provides standardized cloud‑sync error mapping, readiness checks, and utility helpers for backend communication.
frontend/src/utils/exportImport.ts: Implements JSON serialization and deserialization for exporting and importing meditation data with validation and bigint handling.
Manages storing and retrieving quiz scores in localStorage with user identity support.
frontend/src/utils/lotusGrowthModel.ts: Calculates lotus growth visualization parameters from total meditation minutes using multi‑phase progression logic.
frontend/src/utils/meditationStorage.ts: Provides localStorage helpers for guest journal entries, progress data, and rituals with validation and CRUD utilities.
frontend/src/utils/progressRanks.ts: Defines rank tiers based on total meditation minutes and utilities to compute current, next, and formatted rank info.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters for routing and state management.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, shadows, radii, and enabling plugins like typography, container queries, and animate.
project_state.json: Project state JSON describing current meditation app features, requirements, and UI/UX update summaries.
